response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Considering its worth to you is $800,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 950000}
